name: Grand Escape
description:
"Run away!"

Hello, this is developer Kim Ju-im from "Busy age with many games, but little time" offering assistance.
Today, I would like to introduce a special game, the "Grand Escape" game, which I confidently recommend to those who want a simple yet thrilling game.

Do you find new games too complicated? Are the entry barriers too high? If so, the Grand Escape is the solution for you. The Grand Escape is a game that offers simple gameplay with an immersive experience.

Have you ever wanted to steal jewels? Or perhaps you've wanted to run from the police to feel the thrill of life? Don't worry, we understand that you may have many games but little time. That's why we offer a short and concise game that you can enjoy.

Are you tired of digging for diamonds? Do you want diamonds instead of bronze? Whatever you want, we have it in the Grand Escape.

The game has simple controls with an easy-to-understand dot graphic that won't hurt your eyes. The police offer an exciting chase for you while jewels are scattered on the ground. The goal is to escape, and you can enjoy the game with short and concise gameplay.

The Grand Escape is a game where you steal jewels without getting caught by the police. With simple controls and easy-to-understand dot graphics, it offers an enjoyable experience. The game features jewels scattered on the ground and thrilling chases from the police. You can also enjoy the game with the goal of escaping. With short and concise gameplay, it's easy for everyone to enjoy.


You have to collect jewels and escape from the police.
Always think of an escape route and move!

Features:
- Intuitive dot graphics.
- Thrilling experience with easy controls.
